title: Mountain music
creator_credit: Will Vinton and Will Vinton Productions
brief_description: A 3-D animated film portraying the impact of modern technology on the planet. The happy and tranquil life of forest creatures is changed by three musicians whose amplified sounds, cause the eruption of a mountain. Animated by Bevan Vinton, Bob Gardiner and Will Vinton. Featuring Kath Hendrickson. Music by Bill Scream and Paul Jameson.
